import {React, useState} from 'react' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card' import Pic from '../assets/Tiger.jpg' import CardDetailItem from './CardDetailItem' const CardItem = ({ character }) => { console.log(character) const [showDetail, setShowDetail] = useState(false) const handleClose = () => setShowDetail(false) const handleOpen = () => setShowDetail(true) const dummy = character.data return ( <> {dummy.name} Species : {dummy.species}

Status : {dummy.status}

 { } ) } export default CardItem
